title: Zweisitzrakete
overview: A man who wants to steal an old two-seater rocket from the technical museum out of love can't be a bad person. It must have hit him hard. Here's the thing: Manuel is in love with his best friend Mia, but she doesn't know about it because Manuel doesn't want to ruin their friendship. Suddenly, Mia falls head over heels in love – with someone else.
